sentences.sentence: Surreptitiously Mark looked at his watch.
My first instinct, I'm not proud to admit, was to surreptitiously look around to see if anyone was watching.
sentences.translation: （我是小霸王）”我的第一个反应--我并不为傲地承认--是偷偷朝四周扫了一眼，看看是否被人看到了。

sentences.sentence: Other times it comes from surreptitiously catching Mom & Dad putting out the presents in the middle of the night.
sentences.translation: 有些时候他们在半夜里偶然发现爸爸妈妈在偷偷的放置礼物。
